item.hephaestusplus.hand_hammer.descript: The Hand Hammer is a block smashing tool. It is effective against anything smashable by a FabricaeExNihilo Hammer.
item.hephaestusplus.crook.description: The Crook is a tool allowing you to gain String from Infested Leaves. It is effective against anything crookable by a FabricaeExNihilo Crook.
modifier.hephaestusplus.smashing.descrip: Allows the tool to smash blocks like a FabricaeExNihilo Hammer.
modifier.hephaestusplus.crooking.descrip: Allows the tool to crook blocks like a FabricaeExNihilo Crook.
modifier.hephaestusplus.branding.descrip: Hitting mobs may make them hotter. Hotter mobs burn with more lively fire.
modifier.hephaestusplus.cosmic.descripti: Tool mines faster the higher you mine, just don't mine too high
modifier.hephaestusplus.magically_modifi: Mythril's magical properties set the tool off with a bonus upgrade!
modifier.hephaestusplus.stellar_swiftnes: Your tool swings and mines really fast!
modifier.hephaestusplus.durable.descript: Tool is way longer lasting, mines faster and damages more
modifier.hephaestusplus.solid.flavor: The more you damage it, the more durable it becomes!
modifier.hephaestusplus.solid.descriptio: Your tool takes less damage every lost durability point
modifier.hephaestusplus.prismatic.flavor: Focus the light, damage the monsters!
modifier.hephaestusplus.prismatic.descri: Your tool deals more damage when standing in lit areas
modifier.hephaestusplus.storm_spell.desc: Striking an opponent may summon thunder upon them
modifier.hephaestusplus.freezing.descrip: Striking an opponent may freeze them in place for a brief amount of time
modifier.hephaestusplus.carmot_synergy.d: Holding a tool will regenerate Carmot Shield faster
modifier.hephaestusplus.carmot_shield.de: Provides Carmot Shield to armor which absorbs damage and regenerates over time
modifier.hephaestusplus.carmot_boost.des: Strengthens the Carmot Shield, adding more capacity
recipe.hephaestusplus.modifier.carmot_sh: Requires the Carmot Shield ability to be added first
modifier.hephaestusplus.unobtainable.fla: Only you are worthy of this tool.
modifier.hephaestusplus.unobtainable.des: Only the person who forged the tool from this part may hold it
modifier.hephaestusplus.soul_powered.fla: Powered by souls of your deceased opponents
modifier.hephaestusplus.soul_powered.des: Your tool damages more, the more mobs you kill!
modifier.hephaestusplus.bang_bang.descri: Tool can blast tunnels if Legendary Banglum is applied
modifier.hephaestusplus.legendary_banglu: Increases knockback, gives greater buffs to tools with Banglum parts.
modifier.hephaestusplus.manashield.descr: The tool can avoid taking durability damage by consuming Mana from the mana-carrying items.
modifier.hephaestusplus.manashot.flavor: Where are the arrows coming from?
modifier.hephaestusplus.manashot.descrip: Conjures arrows for the bow using Mana
modifier.hephaestusplus.crude_manashield: Doesn't attract Mana as well, but it will do.
The tool has a chance of avoiding durability damage by consuming Mana from the mana-carrying items.
modifier.hephaestusplus.garbage_collecto: Get that weak stuff outta here!
The tool can void mundane items just like the Elementium Pickaxe
modifier.hephaestusplus.terrafirma.descr: If hungry and hurt, holding the tool will encircle you with a soothing, healing aura.
modifier.hephaestusplus.fairy_blessing.d: Increases the Pixie spawn chance upon being damaged when held
Sharply increases mining speed for a while using some Energy, but it takes a while to cool down
Transfer Rate is too small for Energy Velocity to function
modifier.hephaestusplus.red_cell_battery: What does a battery do on my tool?
What does a battery do on my tool?
modifier.hephaestusplus.energy_crystal.f: What does a battery do on my tool?
modifier.hephaestusplus.lapotron_crystal: What does a battery do on my tool?
modifier.hephaestusplus.lapotronic_energ: What does a battery do on my tool?
modifier.hephaestusplus.battery.flavor: What does a battery do on my tool?
modifier.hephaestusplus.red_cell_battery: Tool now has a battery, allowing it to store Energy
Tool now has a battery, allowing it to store Energy
modifier.hephaestusplus.energy_crystal.d: Tool now has a battery, allowing it to store Energy
modifier.hephaestusplus.lapotron_crystal: Tool now has a battery, allowing it to store Energy
modifier.hephaestusplus.lapotronic_energ: Tool now has a battery, allowing it to store Energy
modifier.hephaestusplus.battery.descript: Tool now has a battery, allowing it to store Energy
material.hephaestusplus.adamantite.flavo: Legends say that this alloy is sharper than diamonds.
material.hephaestusplus.aquarium.flavor: An aquatic alloy, has strong affinity to water
material.hephaestusplus.aquarium.encyclo: Negates the mining penalty when mining underwater, and grants +8 mining speed underwater, or +4 mining speed when in rain per level.
material.hephaestusplus.banglum.flavor: A very explosive metal! Don't detonate yourself!
material.hephaestusplus.banglum.encyclop: If Legendary Banglum is applied, the tool can blast 3x3x(level*2) tunnels, consuming 2 durability per block.
material.hephaestusplus.carmot.flavor: Legends say that the Philosopher's Stone was made out of this metal.
material.hephaestusplus.carmot.encyclope: Holding a tool with Carmot Synergy will shorten the shield's maximum cooldown by 1 second per level, and speed up the shield regeneration rate. Binding gives an extra level of Fortune.
material.hephaestusplus.celestium.flavor: A celestial alloy, incredibly sharp and surprisingly lightweight.
material.hephaestusplus.celestium.encycl: Only the person that created the tool can hold it safely - others will take continuous damage holding the tool.
material.hephaestusplus.durasteel.encycl: Grants +12% durability, +4% damage and speed per level
material.hephaestusplus.hallowed.flavor: A spooky alloy, has strong affinity to souls
material.hephaestusplus.hallowed.encyclo:
Killing mobs stores souls inside of the tool.
Increases damage by a half of a natural logarithm of stored souls.
material.hephaestusplus.kyber.flavor: A light-focusing material used in lightsabers.
material.hephaestusplus.kyber.encycloped: Deals up to 15% extra damage per level to mobs in bright places
material.hephaestusplus.metallurgium.fla: The ultimate alloy. Extremely sharp and durable.
material.hephaestusplus.metallurgium.enc: Only the person that created the tool can hold it safely - others will take continuous damage holding the tool.
material.hephaestusplus.mythril.flavor: ... for it was wrought of pure silver to the power and strength of triple steel
material.hephaestusplus.mythril.encyclop: Grants 1 extra upgrade slot per part.
material.hephaestusplus.orichalcum.flavo: A terrarian metal, known for its incredible durability.
material.hephaestusplus.orichalcum.encyc:
Tool takes up to 50% less damage based on a quite complicated formula.
Lower levels bias the characteristic towards lower durabilities, higher levels towards higher durabilities.
material.hephaestusplus.palladium.flavor: With Palladium tools, you can brand mobs like a cowboy.
material.hephaestusplus.palladium.encycl:
Gives a 15% chance per level of inflicting Heat on target.
Set the entity with Heat ablaze for extra damage!
material.hephaestusplus.prometheum.flavo: Despite the name, it's not related to fire.
material.hephaestusplus.prometheum.encyc:
Gives a 5% chance per level of restoring durability each second.
If this trait repairs the tool 1200 times, the tool gains +1 damage.
material.hephaestusplus.quadrillum.flavo: A material sourced from asteroids. Has a high affinity to heights.
material.hephaestusplus.quadrillum.encyc:
Grants mining speed at higher heights, +6 per 64 blocks above 64.
Mines slower deep underground.
material.hephaestusplus.runite.flavor: Not to be confused with Runescape.
material.hephaestusplus.runite.encyclope: Has 10% chance per level to completely immobilize a mob for 5 seconds
material.hephaestusplus.stormyx.flavor: A magical alloy with magical, thundery abilities.
material.hephaestusplus.stormyx.encyclop:
Gives a 2% chance per level of striking a targeted mob with lightning.
Chance quadrupled in thunderstorms
material.hephaestusplus.livingwood.encyc: Makes repairs 50% more effective per part
material.hephaestusplus.livingrock.encyc: Causes the tool to mine faster by half of the square root of the trait level times lost durability
material.hephaestusplus.manastring.flavo: Where are the arrows coming from?
material.hephaestusplus.manastring.encyc: The tool can use mana from mana-containing items to conjure arrows for bows and crossbows
material.hephaestusplus.manasteel.flavor: A mana-infused metal, known for its extreme mana affinity.
material.hephaestusplus.manasteel.encycl:
The tool can use mana from mana-containing items to prevent taking durability damage.
Higher levels decrease the mana cost per durability.
material.hephaestusplus.elementium.flavo: A magical metal imported from Alfheim.
material.hephaestusplus.elementium.encyc:
Voids mundane materials (like stone, dirt, ...) when mining.
Increases the Pixie spawn chance by 3% per level.
material.hephaestusplus.terrasteel.flavo: A perfect fusion of various mana materials
material.hephaestusplus.terrasteel.encyc: If you are hungry and hurt, holding a tool will restore 1 health point every 5 seconds at the cost of some Mana. Faster healing at higher levels.
death.attack.not_your_tool: %s obtained a tool unobtainable for them
